Title: 151: Women in Data Science & How to Help
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with R enthusiast, Lucy D’Agostino McGowan. You will hear about empowering gender minorities in the field of Data Science, learn about considering the use of propensity scores when dealing with non-randomized control samples, and learn how to use best practices in conveying information to avoid information overload.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/151
